item.title: 10 Actors Who Learned Martial Arts For Movies
item.description: In preparation for films that required effortless and eye-catching fight choreography, a handful of actors trained in various martial arts styles.

item.title: Wicked 2's Drastic Tonal Shift Gets Enticing Preview From Jonathan Bailey: "I Can't Wait"
item.description: Jonathan Bailey, who plays Fiyero, provides an enticing preview of Wicked: For Good's drastic tonal shift, saying he "can't wait" for the second half.

item.title: 10 Superhero Movie Legacy Sequels We're Still Holding Out Hope For
item.description: With legacy sequels, both Marvel and DC could revisit some classic superhero movies for a one-off sequel, reviving an iconic past performance.
